markdown: **Activate** <actions string="" />Interact ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Frequency** once per month;   **Effect** You rub _Old Tillimaquin's_ bronzed claws for good luck before setting out on a task that might benefit the town. You can reroll a single failed saving throw within the next 24 hours, but you must take the second result, even if it's worse than your original result. Each person who rubs the claws can benefit only once per month, but there's no limit to how many people can draw on _Old Tillimaquin's_ luck.
name: Interact (divination, fortune, occult)

text: Activate Interact (divination, fortune, occult) Frequency once per month; Effect You rub Old Tillimaquin's bronzed claws for good luck before setting out on a task that might benefit the town. You can reroll a single failed saving throw within the next 24 hours, but you must take the second result, even if it's worse than your original result. Each person who rubs the claws can benefit only once per month, but there's no limit to how many people can draw on Old Tillimaquin's luck.
